name: Cosmodrome
description:
Cosmodrome is a retro puzzle-platformer game inspired by 80s arcade and computer games. In each stage, your goal is to pilot the rocket in order to hit its target while avoiding obstacles and collecting powerups.

The game includes level-editing tools that allow players to create custom sequences of levels. These custom levels can be exported and shared with other players, and in turn the player can play custom levels created by other players.

MOBILE SUPPORT COMING SOON!

-- CONTROLS --

[ Space ] or [ ENTER ] to launch the rocket

[ WASD ] or [ ARROWS ] to change the rocket's angle

[ P ] to pause and/or quit

[ Z ] to toggle sound
